name: Recipes
goals: Create a simple, focused recipe site without the clutter of ads and blog content
Prioritize accessibility and visual clarity while maintaining a colorful palette
Provide useful tools that make you want to get your kitchen dirty

features.text: Beautiful svg icons designed and created entirely by me
Over-sized button hitboxes for increased accessibility
Smart ingredient list that can easily scale recipes and swap between metric or imperial measurements
Thoughtful instructions that include ingredient amounts so you don't have to double-check
Highly responsive page layout designed for any device
An entire spectrum of colors, all adhering to the WCAG's text and graphics contrast requirements

learned: How to use React's Contexts to globally update an app's color and layout
How to use React's BrowserRouter and HashRouter to handle stateful urls in a single-page app
How to implement a Full-Stack web app using MongoDB and Express.js
